name: Escaping Dream 1 Indonesia Beta
description:
Escaping Dream is a game that made by AN 11 YEARS OLD KID the game was probably for youtuber called  Windah basudara this game Story's Windah is Sleeping and He's Dream is nightmare he Solve some puzzle and finally he can Access Escape Door and this will leading to Episode 2

NOTE: this game still in beta  So there is some changes when other beta version came out!

NOTE: this game is not duplicating other game and not inspired by other game, please don't sue this game

NOTE: however you can teleport in this game even you can teleport through the wall

here's the key

4 is teleport to front

5 is teleport to Right

6 is teleport to left

7 is teleport to Behind
